title: How-to Template # Title case
description: '...' # 20-50 words
keywords:
 - contributing
last_update: 
   date: 09/01/2024 
   author: Patricia McPhee # Topic SME
doc_type: how-to

draft: true
---

- Briefly explain the purpose of the how-to, with the **user intent** in mind.
- Outline what the user will learn or achieve by the end of the topic.
- Give a brief background. Remember to keep this short because users scan.

## Prerequisites or Before you get started

- List the necessary materials or prerequisites.
- Include links to any essential background information.

## Step-by-step instructions

- Break down the process into clear detailed steps.
- If necessary, break down the steps into smaller sections.
- Add images or screenshots if they can aid understanding.
Step-by-Step Instructions Break down the process into clear, detailed steps. Use bullet points or numbered lists for clarity.

Step 1: [Description of Step 1]

Detail the actions required in this step.
Include any tips or warnings where necessary.
Step 2: [Description of Step 2]

Continue with sequential steps, providing clear instructions.
Add images or screenshots if they can aid understanding.
...

## Troubleshooting (Optional)

Provide solutions or workarounds for common issues or problems that may arise.

## FAQs (Optional)

Answer frequent questions related to this topic.

## Next steps

- Suggest further actions, readings, or related topics.
- Provide links to related topics, resources, or products.
